name: BRUNO
description:
Buggy game, my first unity project

If you have some tips for code and stuff write it in the comments(would make me very happy)

The Animations are trash

There is currently one easter egg in the game.

There is no Game Over screen yet xD.

This is a project where I try unity things out and it's currently not a good game(trash tbh).

This project will be weekly updated and everytime it gets more playable.

I am german so I am very sorry about bad english.
